name: kujua-lite
description: SMS data collection designed for rural environments (Beta Version)
long_description: Kujua Lite is a web based SMS data collection and analytics tool focused on community health care workers in rural environments. We help large health organizations collect and analyze data sent from health care workers using ordinary mobile phones.

locale.title: Locale
locale.description: Default tries to use best option according to browser settings, you can override that here.

locale.title: Locale
locale.description: Default tries to use best option according to browser settings, you can override that here.

off_form.title: Stop Notifications Form
off_form.description: When receiving a form of this type, stop sending notifications

on_form.title: Resume Notifications Form
on_form.description: When receiving a form of this type, resume sending notifications

confirm_deactivation.title: Confirm Muting Notifications?
confirm_deactivation.description: Whether to signal the administrator when notifications are muted.

confirm_deactivation_message.title: Administrator Mute Message
confirm_deactivation_message.description: The message to place on the form for administration attention.
confirm_deactivation_message.default: {{chw_name}} {{chw_phone}} has deactivated notifications on patient id {{patient_id}}.

on_mute_message.title: On Mute Message
on_mute_message.description: The message to send when stopping notifications.
on_mute_message.default: Thank you. Notifications for {{patient_id}} have been stopped.

on_unmute_message.title: On Resume Message
on_unmute_message.description: The message to send when resuming notifications.
on_unmute_message.default: Thank you. Notifications for {{patient_id}} are resumed.

patient_not_found.title: Patient Not Found Message
patient_not_found.description: The message to send when the patient is not found for a notification change.

schedule_morning_hours.title: Schedule morning hours
schedule_morning_hours.description: The scheduler only sends messages after this hour, M-F.

schedule_evening_hours.title: Schedule evening hours
schedule_evening_hours.description: The scheduler only sends messages before this hour, M-F.

synthetic_date.title: Synthetic date
synthetic_date.description: Only modify this if you are testing the scheduler and want to simulate a specific date. e.g. 201304121200

match.title: Match
match.description: This is consumed by RegExp() and used to match a phone number. e.g. \\+997

replace.title: Replace with
replace.description: Replace the match with this value.

id_format.title: Patient ID Format
id_format.description: Length of generated numerical identifiers. Note, an extra check digit is always used, so the default value (1111) generates a length of 5.

report_accepted.title: Report Accepted Message
report_accepted.description: Message to send when the report has been accepted.
report_accepted.default: Thank you, {{contact_name}}. Your report for {{patient_id}} has been processed.

silence_type.title: Silence Scheduled Message Type
silence_type.description: After receiving this report, silence scheduled messages of this type. (Or leave blank.)

silence_for.title: Silence Messages For
silence_for.description: Silence the message type for this long. Uses momentjs.com syntax, e.g. '1 week'.

registration_not_found.title: Registration Not Found Message
registration_not_found.description: The reply to send when the patient ID is not found.
registration_not_found.default: This message could not be processed as a registration for {{patient_id}} was not found.

rule.title: Validation Rule
rule.description: The Pupil.js validation rule. See here for rules: https://github.com/Dragory/Pupil.js/blob/master/README.md. Backslashes must be double escaped.

message.title: Error Message
message.description: The error message to send when validation fails. Accepted substitutions: patient_id, contact_name, contact_phone, patient_name, serial_number, clinic_phone, clinic_name

form.title: Pregnancy Registration Form
form.description: Form code of a pregnancy registration

property.title: Property
property.description: The property on the JSON form to validate.

rule.title: Validation Rule
rule.description: The Pupil.js validation rule. See here for rules: https://github.com/Dragory/Pupil.js/blob/master/README.md. Backslashes must be double escaped.

message.title: Error Message
message.description: The error message to send when validation fails. Accepted substitutions: patient_id, contact_name, contact_phone, patient_name, serial_number, clinic_phone, clinic_name
message.default: Please include a valid Patient Name '{{patient_name}}' should be less than 50 characters.

form.title: Birth Registration Form
form.description: Form code of a birth registration

property.title: Property
property.description: The property on the JSON form to validate.

rule.title: Validation Rule
rule.description: The Pupil.js validation rule. See here for rules: https://github.com/Dragory/Pupil.js/blob/master/README.md. Backslashes must be double escaped.

message.title: Error Message
message.description: The error message to send when validation fails. Accepted substitutions: patient_id, contact_name, contact_phone, patient_name, serial_number, clinic_phone, clinic_name
message.default: Please include a valid Patient Name '{{patient_name}}' should be less than 50 characters.

form.title: Reminder Form Code
form.description: What form this reminder is for. E.g., ANC

cron.title: Reminder Cron Configuration
cron.description: A cron definition of the schedule. E.g., weekly on Monday at 9am: '0 9 * * 1'

mute_after_form_for.title: Mute Reminders For
mute_after_form_for.description: After receiving a form, how long to mute reminders for. Uses momentjs format, e.g. '5 days'

message.title: Reminder Text
message.description: The text of the message. Has the substitutions: week, year

key.title: Reminder Type
key.description: A made up keyword to define this schedule. e.g. anc_reminders

form.title: Registration Form
form.description: The form code of the registration form that triggers schedule creation. e.g. ANCR

start_from.title: Timestamp Property Name
start_from.description: The property name from the form that is used to calculate the offset in the reminders below. e.g. lmp_date

registration_response.title: Registration response message
registration_response.description: The response message sent out when a schedule is created. e.g. Thank you {{chw_name}} for registering {{patient_name}}. Patient ID is {{patient_id}}. Next visit is needed in {{weeks}} weeks.
registration_response.default: Thank you {{chw_name}} for registering {{patient_name}}. Patient ID is {{patient_id}}. ANC visit is needed in {{weeks}} weeks.

message.title: Message Text
message.description: e.g. Greetings, {{chw_name}}. {{patient_name}} {{patient_id}} is due for a 12 week ANC visit this week. Please visit her and remind her to visit the health facility.
message.default: Greetings, {{chw_name}}. {{patient_name}} {{patient_id}} is due for a 12 week ANC visit this week. Please visit her and remind her to visit the health facility.

group.title: Message Group Number
group.description: You can group reminders together by assigning a group number so they can be cleared in batches.

offset.title: Send Message After
offset.description: This value is added to the timestamp property value to determine when to send the reminder. It supports minutes, hours, days, weeks, months and years. e.g. 12 weeks

day.title: Day
day.description: The day to send the message.

message.title: Message
message.default: Please submit report for week {{week}} immediately.
message.description: Message will be sent and the following strings will be substituted into the message: {{week}}, {{year}} and {{form}}.

default.sw: Kituo cha Afya cha Mawasiliano Jina
Kituo cha Afya cha Mawasiliano Simu

default.fr: Le recipient du message n'a pas été trouvé.
default.es: No se encontro destinatario para el mensaje.
default.ne: सन्देश​ पाउने व्यक्ति पत्ता लगाउन असफल।​
फारममा भर्नुपर्ने भन्दा अतिरिक्त कुरा भरिएको।

default.en: The form sent '{{form}}' was not recognized. Please complete it again and resend. If this problem persists contact your supervisor.
default.fr: Le formulaire envoyé '{{form}}' n'est pas reconnu, SVP corriger et renvoyer. Si ce problème persiste contactez votre superviseur.
default.es: No se reconocio el reporte enviado '{{form}}'. Por favor intente de nuevo. Si el problema persiste, informe al director.
default.ne: फारम मिलेन​। कृपया फेरि प्रयास गर्नुहोला।

default.en: The form sent '{{form}}' was not properly completed. Please complete it and resend. If this problem persists contact your supervisor.
default.fr: Le formulaire envoyé '{{form}}' n'est pas complet, SVP corriger et renvoyer. Si ce problème persiste contactez votre superviseur.
default.es: No se completo el reporte '{{form}}'. Por favor completelo y vuelvalo a enviar. Si el problema persiste, informe al director.
default.ne: फारम ​पूरा भएन​। कृपया फेरि प्रयास गर्नुहोला।

default.en: The form sent '{{form}}' was not properly completed. Please complete it and resend. If this problem persists contact your supervisor.
default.fr: Le formulaire envoyé '{{form}}' n'est pas complet, SVP corriger et renvoyer. Si ce problème persiste contactez votre superviseur.
default.es: No se completo el reporte '{{form}}'. Por favor completelo y vuelvalo a enviar. Si el problema persiste, informe al director.
default.ne: फारम  ​पूरा भएन​। कृपया फेरि प्रयास गर्नुहोला।

default.es: No se encontro a la unidad de salud.
default.ne: सम्बन्धित स्वास्थ्य संस्था पत्ता लगाउन असफल।

default.en: It looks like you sent an empty message, please try to resend. If you continue to have this problem please contact your supervisor.
default.fr: Nous avons des troubles avec votre message, SVP renvoyer. Si vous continuez à avoir des problèmes contactez votre superviseur.
default.es: El mensaje esta en blanco, por favor reenvielo. Si encuentra un problema, informe al director.
default.ne: सन्देश​ खाली छ​ । कृपया फेरि प्रयास गर्नुहोला।

default.en: Your form submission was received, thank you.
default.fr: Merci, votre formulaire a été bien reçu.

default.en: SMS message received; it will be reviewed shortly. If you were trying to submit a text form, please enter a correct form code and try again.
default.fr: Merci, votre message a été bien reçu.
default.es: Recibimos tu mensaje, lo procesaremos pronto. Si querias mandar un reporte, intentalo nuevamente en el formato adecuado.
default.ne: सन्देश​ प्राप्त भयो। रिपोर्ट पठाउनुभएको हो भने मिलेन; ​पुन:​ पठाउनुहोला।

default.en: Reporting Unit ID is incorrect. Please correct and submit a complete report again.
default.fr: Établissement non trouvé, svp corriger et renvoyer
default.es: No encontramos a su centro de salud. Por favor corrijalo y reenvie el reporte.
default.ne: रिपोर्टिङ् युनिटको आइ.डि मिलेन। कृपया ​मिलाएर​  ​पुन:​ पठाउनुहोला।

default.fr: Nom de la santé Contact Center
Nom de la santé Contact Center
